src:
En barrio villa cubas
Intentaron hacerlo caer de la moto en la que circulaba, para robársela

01 Nov 2019, 05:00

Un motociclista, de 23 años, fue acorralado por dos sujetos en moto, quienes a golpes de puño y patadas intentaron hacerle perder el equilibrio para sustraerle su rodado, cuando circulaba por el barrio Villa Cubas. 
Según fuentes judiciales sucedió ayer a las 0.30 cuando iba por calle Nieva y Castilla en sentido sur- norte y en inmediaciones a Congresal Centeno dos sujetos a bordo de dos motos intentaron acorralarlo. 
Según su testimonio, los sujetos se ubicaron a sus costados y comenzaron a darle puñetazos y patadas, a él y la moto que conducía, para hacerle perder el equilibrio. 
Afortunadamente, el joven logró mantener el control sobre el rodado, una Yamaha YBR 125cc., y tras acelerar, pudo evadir el ataque de los malvivientes, quienes, según indicó, habrían tenido como objetivo sustraerle la motocicleta. 
Poco después al joven concurrió a la sede judicial a radicar la denuncia penal correspondiente. 
Se supo que desde la fiscalía de turno se solicitó el secuestro de las imágenes registradas por las cámaras de seguridad instaladas en la  zona, sean públicas o privadas. 
Lesionada en un arrebato
Otro hecho de inseguridad fue registrado en el barrio 920 viviendas cuando una mujer fue abordada por un delincuente, quien le causó lesiones. 
Según la información en la que pudo acceder este diario ocurrió aproximadamente a las 22.10 cuando la damnificada esperaba un colectivo en una parada de calle Ingamana y avenida gobernador Galíndez. 
Un sujeto se acercó y tras amenazarla de muerte le ordenó que entregue sus pertenencias y la cartera que llevaba en uno de sus hombros. Antes de que pudiera reaccionar el sujeto le dio un empujón y con golpes le arrancó el bolso y se dio a la fuga a bordo de una moto que era conducida por un cómplice.
text:
In neighborhood villa cubas
They tried to make him fall off the motorcycle on which he was driving, to steal it

01 Nov 2019, 05:00

A 23-year-old motorcyclist was cornered by two motorcycle subjects, who, with fists and kicks, tried to make him lose his balance to steal his shot when he was driving through the Villa Cubas neighborhood.
According to judicial sources, it happened yesterday at 0.30 when he went down Nieva and Castilla streets in a south-north direction and in the immediate vicinity of Congresal Centeno two subjects on board two motorcycles tried to corner him.
According to his testimony, the subjects were placed at his sides and began to punch and kick him and the motorcycle he was driving, to make him lose his balance.
Fortunately, the young man managed to maintain control over the shot, a Yamaha YBR 125cc., And after accelerating, he was able to evade the attack of the survivors, who, he said, would have aimed to steal his motorcycle.
Shortly after the young man went to the judicial headquarters to file the corresponding criminal complaint.
It was learned that from the prosecution on duty the kidnapping of the images registered by the security cameras installed in the area, whether public or private, was requested.
Injured in an outburst
Another fact of insecurity was registered in the neighborhood of 920 homes when a woman was approached by a criminal, who caused her injuries.
According to the information in which he was able to access this newspaper, it happened at approximately 10:10 p.m. when the victim waited for a bus at a stop in Ingamana Street and Governor Galindez Avenue.
A subject approached and after threatening her with death he ordered her to hand over her belongings and the wallet she carried on one of her shoulders. Before he could react the subject gave him a push and with blows he ripped off his bag and fled aboard a motorcycle that was driven by an accomplice.
